content:
Hard-working, long-suffering but always appreciated...

Current PhD Students:

  • Tyler Kaczmarek, from 2013.
  • Norrathep Rattanavipanon, from 2015.
  • Ercan Ozturk, from 2016.
  • Ivan Oliveira Nunes, from 2016.
  • Yoshimichi Nakasuka, from 2017.

Former PhD Students (advisor):

  1. Tyler Kaczmarek, UCI 2018, Research Staff, MIT Lincoln Labs.
  2. Christopher Wood, UCI 2017, Software Engineer, Apple.
  3. Cesar Ghali, UCI 2016, Software Engineer, Google.
  4. Mishari Almishari, UCI, 2012, Assistant Professor, King Saud University, Saudi Arabia.
  5. Yanbin Lu, UCI, 2012, Software Engineer, Google.
  6. Emiliano De Cristofaro, UCI, 2011, Reader (Associate Professor), University College London, UK.
  7. John Solis, UCI, 2010, Security Engineer, PullString, Inc.
  8. Karim ElDefrawy, UCI, 2010, Senior Researcher, Computer Science Lab, SRI International
  9. Ersin Uzun, UCI, 2010, Vice President and Director of System Sciences Laboratory (SSL) at PARC.
  10. Di Ma, UCI, 2009, Associate Professor, University of Michigan, Dearborn.
  11. Claudio Soriente, UCI, 2009, Researcher, NEC Research Europe, Madrid, Spain.
  12. Jihye Kim, UCI, 2008, Assistant Professor, Kookmin University, Korea (co-advised with S. Jarecki).
  13. Nitesh Saxena, UCI, 2006, Professor, University of Alabama (co-advised with S. Jarecki).
  14. Maithili Narasimha, UCI, 2006, Member of Technical Staff, CISCO.
  15. Einar Mykletun, UCI, 2006, CTO, Identillect Technologies.
  16. Jeong Hyun Yi, UCI, 2005, Associate Professor, Soongsil University, Korea.
  17. Xuhua Ding, USC, 2003, Associate Professor, Singapore Management University, Singapore.
  18. Yongdae Kim, USC, 2002, Professor, KAIST, Korea.
  19. Michael Steiner, Universität des Saarlandes (Germany), 2002, Researcher, Intel Labs (co-advised with B. Pfitzmann).
  20. Giuseppe Ateniese, Universitá degli Studi di Genova (Italy), 1999, Professor and Chair, Stevens Institute of Technology.
  21. Brenda Timmerman, USC, 1998, Professor, California State University, Northridge. (Deceased).

Former PhD Students (committee member):

  1. Philip Ginzboorg, Aalto University, Finland, 2014.
  2. Abdelberi Chaabane, INRIA Rhone-Alpes, France, 2014.
  3. Steffen Schulz, Macquarie University, Australia, 2014.
  4. Lei Wei, UNC Chapel Hill, 2013.
  5. Luis Angel Bathen, UCI, 2012.
  6. Anh Le, UCI, 2012.
  7. Todd Jackson, UCI, 2012.
  8. Ali Bagherzandi, UCI, 2011.
  9. Ahren Studer, CMU, 2011.
  10. Alessandro Colantonio, Universitá di Roma Tre (Italy), 2011.
  11. Kasper Bonne Rasmussen, ETH Zuerich (Switzerland), 2011.
  12. Dan Forsberg, Aalto University (Finland), 2010.
  13. Julien Freudiger, EPFL (Switzerland), 2010.
  14. Xiaomin Liu, UCI, 2010.
  15. Bryan Parno, CMU, 2010.
  16. Gabriele Oligieri, Universitá di Pisa (Italy), 2010.
  17. Enrique Caiuch, UCI, 2009.
  18. Gergely Acs, Budapest University of Technology and Economics (Hungary), 2009.
  19. Bijit Hore, UCI, 2007.
  20. Walid Bagga, ENST / Institut Eurecom (France), 2006.
  21. Vivek Haldar, UCI, 2006.
  22. Kumar Viswanath, UC Santa Cruz, 2005.
  23. Pietro Michiardi, ENST / Institut Eurecom (France), 2004.
  24. Alain Pannetrat, ENST / Institut Eurecom (France), 2002.
  25. Adrian Perrig, CMU, 2003.
